mapper.select: /* SignMapper.selectTicketByTicketId */ select d.member_name , d.member_phone , d.member_gender , d.member_birth , d.member_address , d.member_memo , d.member_join_path , a.ticket_code , b.trainer_product_name , a.ticket_start_date , a.ticket_end_date , a.ticket_use_cnt , a.original_ticket_id , b.trainer_product_count , b.trainer_product_price , c.refund_cnt , c.refund_price , c.refund_date_time from ticket a left join trainer_product b on a.trainer_product_id = b.trainer_product_id left join refund c on a.ticket_id = c.ticket_id left join member d on a.member_id = d.member_id where a.ticket_id = #{ticketId}

/* SignMapper.selectTicketByTicketIdForAssign */ select a.original_ticket_id , e.center_name as assign_center_name , f.assignTrainerName as assign_trainer_name , d.member_name from ticket a left join trainer_product b on a.trainer_product_id = b.trainer_product_id left join member d on a.member_id = d.member_id left join center e on a.center_id = e.center_id left join trainer f on a.trainer_id = f.trainer_id where (a.ticket_id = #{ticketId} or a.originalTicketId = #{ticketId})
